ygData.subject: Gnomestock '99
ygData.msgSnippet: Could we possibly do this on Saturday? Or perhaps later in the eve? I have to work that day... Double Entendre Bard of 21 SOngs Innoruuk ... This idea was
ygData.messageBody:
Could we possibly do this on Saturday? Or perhaps
later in the eve? I have to work that day...


Double Entendre
Bard of 21 SOngs
Innoruuk

------------------------------------------------------

This idea was brought up on this mailing list quite
some time ago, and
never
reached fruition. I therefore would like to entreat
the EQ bardic
community
to join ranks and set out to do something truly silly
and pointless
together.

At this point, I am sure you are thinking, "What can
we do together,
Aloro,
that would be silly and pointless and FUN?"

You ARE thinking that, aren't you?

Good! So here is my proposal:

What: Gnomestock '99
When: Friday, November 26th, starting at noon PST (or
another time if
the
community prefers...)
Who: Anyone who plays a bard on EQ, or any of their
friends, family, or

pets.

<snip>
